blocks.name: mpt2ndm0
blocks.content: The value of an operation given by a maps-to rule is the empty set if the arguments are not contained in the base sets of the rule. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2ndm0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  mpan(wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), emptycls), wss(cdm(c4), cxp(c1, c3)))
  eqsstri(cdm(c4), cxp(c1, c3), cdm(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)))))
  dmeqi(c4, coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))))
  eqtri(c4, coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c5))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c1, c3, c5)
  dmoprabss(s0, s1, hs0, c1, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  nssdmovg(c4, c1, c3, c0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mpt2ndm0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (¬(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[c4]c2)= ∅)
  ⊣ c4 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  mpan(¬(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (c0[c4]c2)= ∅, dom(c4)⊆(c1 × c3))
  eqsstri(dom(c4), (c1 × c3), dom({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ hs0 = c5)}))
  dmeqi(c4, { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ hs0 = c5)})
  eqtri(c4, { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ hs0 = c5)}, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c5))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c1, c3, c5)
  dmoprabss(s0, s1, hs0, c1, c3, hs0 = c5)
  nssdmovg(c4, c1, c3, c0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

blocks.name: elmpt2cl
blocks.content: If a two-parameter class is not empty, constrain the implicit pair. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elmpt2cl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  sylib(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5)), wcel(cop(c1, c3), cxp(c4, c5)))
  sseldi(cop(c1, c3), cxp(c4, c5), cdm(c2), wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  eqsstri(cdm(c2), cxp(c4, c5), cdm(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wceq(cv(hs0), c6)))))
  dmeqi(c2, coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wceq(cv(hs0), c6))))
  eqtri(c2, coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wceq(cv(hs0), c6))), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c4, c5, c6)
  dmoprabss(s0, s1, hs0, c4, c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  eleq2s(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), cfv(c2, cop(c1, c3)), wcel(cop(c1, c3), cdm(c2)))
  elfvdm(c0, c2, cop(c1, c3))
  df-ov(c1, c2, c3)
  opelxp(c1, c3, c4, c5)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elmpt2cl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)→(c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c5))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c4, s1 ∈ c5 ↦ c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  sylib(c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), (c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c5), < c1, c3 > ∈(c4 × c5))
  sseldi(< c1, c3 >, (c4 × c5), dom(c2), c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3))
  eqsstri(dom(c2), (c4 × c5), dom({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c5)∧ hs0 = c6)}))
  dmeqi(c2, { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c5)∧ hs0 = c6)})
  eqtri(c2, { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c5)∧ hs0 = c6)}, (s0 ∈ c4, s1 ∈ c5 ↦ c6))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c4, c5, c6)
  dmoprabss(s0, s1, hs0, c4, c5, hs0 = c6)
  eleq2s(c0, (c1[c2]c3), (c2 ` < c1, c3 >), < c1, c3 > ∈ dom(c2))
  elfvdm(c0, c2, < c1, c3 >)
  df-ov(c1, c2, c3)
  opelxp(c1, c3, c4, c5)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
}

blocks.name: elmpt2cl1
blocks.content: If a two-parameter class is not empty, the first argument is in its nominal domain. (Contributed by FL, 15-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: elmpt2cl2
blocks.content: If a two-parameter class is not empty, the second argument is in its nominal domain. (Contributed by FL, 15-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: elovmpt2
blocks.content: Utility lemma for two-parameter classes. _EDITORIAL_: can simplify ~ isghm , ~ islmhm . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elovmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c0, c6)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c7))
  -| wcel(c7, universe)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(c7, c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c0, c6))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c0, c6))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  bitr4i(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c0, c6)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5)), wcel(c0, c6)))
  biadanii(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5)), wcel(c0, c6))
  elmpt2cl(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7)
  eleq2d(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), c6, wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5)))
  mpd3an3(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5), wceq(co(c1, c2, c3), c6), wcel(c6, universe))
  mpi(wa(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5)), wcel(c6, universe), wal(s0, wal(s1, wcel(c7, universe))))
  gen2(s0, s1, wcel(c7, universe))
  spc2gv(s0, s1, c1, c4, c3, c5, wcel(c7, universe), wcel(c6, universe))
  eleq1d(c7, universe, c6, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))
  ovmpt2ga(s0, s1, c1, c4, c3, c5, c6, universe, c2, c7)
  df-3an(wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c0, c6))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c6, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c6, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elovmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)↔(c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c5 ∧ c0 ∈ c6))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ c4, s1 ∈ c5 ↦ c7)
  ⊣ c7 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ ((s0 = c1 ∧ s1 = c3)→ c7 = c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)↔(c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c5 ∧ c0 ∈ c6)), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)↔(c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c5 ∧ c0 ∈ c6)), d(s1, c0))
  bitr4i(c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), (c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c5 ∧ c0 ∈ c6), ((c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c5)∧ c0 ∈ c6))
  biadanii(c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), (c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c5), c0 ∈ c6)
  elmpt2cl(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7)
  eleq2d(c0, (c1[c2]c3), c6, (c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c5))
  mpd3an3(c1 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ c5, (c1[c2]c3)= c6, c6 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpi((c1 ∈ c4 ∧ c3 ∈ c5), c6 ∈ 𝕌, ∀(s0, ∀(s1, c7 ∈ 𝕌)))
  gen2(s0, s1, c7 ∈ 𝕌)
  spc2gv(s0, s1, c1, c4, c3, c5, c7 ∈ 𝕌, c6 ∈ 𝕌)
  eleq1d(c7, universe, c6, (s0 = c1 ∧ s1 = c3))
  ovmpt2ga(s0, s1, c1, c4, c3, c5, c6, universe, c2, c7)
  df-3an(c1 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ c5, c0 ∈ c6)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c6, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c6, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: elovmpt2rab
blocks.content: Implications for the value of an operation, defined by the maps-to notation with a class abstraction as a result, having an element. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm elovmpt2rab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c0, c4)))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, crab(s2, c4, w0)))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wcel(c4, universe))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  mpcom(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c0, c4)), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  elmpt2cl(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, universe, universe, crab(s2, c4, w0))
  sylbid(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), w3a(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c0, c4)), wcel(c0, crab(s2, c4, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0)))))
  eleq2d(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), crab(s2, c4, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0))), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  ovmpt2dxf(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, crab(s2, c4, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0))), universe, universe, crab(s2, c4, w0), universe, universe, wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, crab(s2, c4, w0))))
  rabbidv(s2, c4, wa(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c3))), w0, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c3)), wb(w0, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0))))
  sylan9bbr(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c3), w0, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0)), wsbc(s1, c3, w0))
  sbceq1a(s1, c3, w0)
  sbceq1a(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0))
  eqidd(universe, wa(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  simpl(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  simpr(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wcel(crab(s2, c4, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0))), universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  rabexg(s2, c4, universe, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0)))
  nfan(s0, wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  nfel1(s0, c1, universe)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  nfel1(s0, c3, universe)
  nfan(s1, wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  nfel1(s1, c1, universe)
  nfel1(s1, c3, universe)
  nfcv(s1, c3)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  nfrab(s0, s2, c4, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0)))
  nfsbc1v(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0))
  nfcv(s0, c4)
  nfrab(s1, s2, c4, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0)))
  nfsbc(s1, s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0))
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfsbc1v(s1, c3, w0)
  nfcv(s1, c4)
  syl11(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wcel(c0, crab(s2, c4, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0)))), w3a(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c0, c4)), wcel(c0, c4))
  simplbi2com(wcel(c0, c4), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), w3a(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c0, c4)))
  df-3an(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe), wcel(c0, c4))
  elrabi(s2, c0, c4, wsbc(s0, c1, wsbc(s1, c3, w0)))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c1, universe)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c3, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elovmpt2rab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)→(c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ c4))
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { s2 ∈ c4 | w0 })
  ⊣ ((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌)→ c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  mpcom(c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ c4), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌))
  elmpt2cl(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, universe, universe, { s2 ∈ c4 | w0 })
  sylbid((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌), c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ c4), c0 ∈ { s2 ∈ c4 |[c1 / s0][c3 / s1]w0 })
  eleq2d(c0, (c1[c2]c3), { s2 ∈ c4 |[c1 / s0][c3 / s1]w0 }, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌))
  ovmpt2dxf(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, { s2 ∈ c4 |[c1 / s0][c3 / s1]w0 }, universe, universe, { s2 ∈ c4 | w0 }, universe, universe, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌))
  a1i((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌), c2 =(s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { s2 ∈ c4 | w0 }))
  rabbidv(s2, c4, ((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌)∧(s0 = c1 ∧ s1 = c3)), w0, [c1 / s0][c3 / s1]w0)

} = {
  mpcom(c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈[c1 / s0]c4), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌))

  ovmpt2dxf(s1, s2, c1, c2, c3, { s3 ∈[c1 / s0]c4 |[c1 / s1][c3 / s2]w0 }, universe, universe, { s3 ∈[s1 / s0]c4 | w0 }, universe, universe, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌))

  ad2antrl((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌), s1 = c1, s2 = c3, [s1 / s0]c4 =[c1 / s0]c4)

  rabexg(s3, [c1 / s0]c4, universe, [c1 / s1][c3 / s2]w0)

  simplbi2com(c0 ∈[c1 / s0]c4, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈[c1 / s0]c4))

blocks.name: 2mpt20
blocks.content: If the operation value of the operation value of two nested maps-to notation is not empty, all involved arguments belong to the corresponding base classes of the maps-to notations. (Contributed by AV, 21-May-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm 2mpt20(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, class c10) {
  |- wi(wn(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)))), wceq(co(c4, co(c0, c8, c2), c6), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c8, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c9))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, c8, c2), cmpo(s2, s3, c5, c7, c10)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s3, c5)
  -| diffsc(s3, c7)
} = {
  sylbi(wn(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)))), wceq(co(c4, co(c0, c8, c2), c6), emptycls), wo(wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wn(wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)))))
  ianor(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)))
  jaoi3(wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wn(wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), wceq(co(c4, co(c0, c8, c2), c6), emptycls))
  syl6eq(co(c4, co(c0, c8, c2), c6), emptycls, co(c4, emptycls, c6), wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))))
  oveqd(c4, co(c0, c8, c2), c6, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))))
  mpt2ndm0(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c8, c9)
  0ov(c4, c6)
  sylanbr(wn(wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))), wn(wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), wceq(co(c4, co(c0, c8, c2), c6), emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  notnotb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  eqtrd(co(c4, co(c0, c8, c2), c6), emptycls, co(c4, cmpo(s2, s3, c5, c7, c10), c6), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)))))
  oveqd(c4, co(c0, c8, c2), c6, cmpo(s2, s3, c5, c7, c10), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), wceq(co(c0, c8, c2), cmpo(s2, s3, c5, c7, c10)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), wceq(co(c4, cmpo(s2, s3, c5, c7, c10), c6), emptycls))
  mpt2ndm0(s2, s3, c4, c5, c6, c7, cmpo(s2, s3, c5, c7, c10), c10)
  eqid(cmpo(s2, s3, c5, c7, c10))
}

blocks.name: relmptopab
blocks.content: Any function to sets of ordered pairs produces a relation on function value unconditionally. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Aug-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm relmptopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wrel(cfv(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c2, copab(s1, s2, w0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbir(wrel(cfv(c0, c1)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))
  mprg(s0, c2, wss(cfv(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)), wss(copab(s1, s2, w0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  fvmptss(s0, c2, copab(s1, s2, w0), cxp(universe, universe), c0, c1)
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wss(copab(s1, s2, w0), cxp(universe, universe)))
  mpbi(wss(copab(s1, s2, w0), cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(copab(s1, s2, w0)))
  relopab(s1, s2, w0)
  df-rel(copab(s1, s2, w0))
  df-rel(cfv(c0, c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, universe, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm relmptopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

thm f1ocnvd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wceq(ccnv(c0), cmpt(s0, c2, c3))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s1, c1, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c3, c6))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wceq(ccnv(c0), cmpt(s0, c2, c3)))
  sylanbrc(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c2), wfn(c0, c1), wfn(ccnv(c0), c2))
  syl(w0, wfn(c0, c1), wral(s1, c1, wcel(c4, c5)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  fnmpt(s1, c1, c4, c5, c0)
  mpbird(w0, wfn(ccnv(c0), c2), wfn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c2))
  syl(w0, wfn(cmpt(s0, c2, c3), c2), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c3, c6)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, wcel(c3, c6))
  fnmpt(s0, c2, c3, c6, cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c2, c3))
  fneq1d(ccnv(c0), c2, cmpt(s0, c2, c3), w0)
  dff1o4(c0, c1, c2)
  3eqtr4g(ccnv(c0), cmpt(s0, c2, c3), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3))), w0)
  opabbidv(s0, s1, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cv(s1), c3)))
  eqtri(ccnv(c0), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))), ccnv(copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4)))))
  cnveqi(c0, copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))))
  eqtri(c0, copab(s1, s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wceq(cv(s0), c4))), cmpt(s1, c1, c4))

blocks.pretty:
thm f1ocnvd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 : c1 ↔ c2)∧ `' c0 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)))
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →((s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 = c4)↔(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 = c3)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, (c0 : c1 ↔ c2), `' c0 =(s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  sylanbrc(w0, (c0 : c1 ↔ c2), c0[Fn]c1, `' c0[Fn]c2)
  syl(w0, c0[Fn]c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c4 ∈ c5))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, w0, c4 ∈ c5)
  fnmpt(s1, c1, c4, c5, c0)
  mpbird(w0, `' c0[Fn]c2, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)[Fn]c2)
  syl(w0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)[Fn]c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c6))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, c3 ∈ c6)
  fnmpt(s0, c2, c3, c6, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  fneq1d(`' c0, c2, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), w0)
  dff1o4(c0, c1, c2)
  3eqtr4g(`' c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), { < s0, s1 > |(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 = c4)}, { < s0, s1 > |(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 = c3)}, w0)
  opabbidv(s0, s1, w0, (s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 = c4), (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s1 = c3))
  eqtri(`' c0, { < s0, s1 > |(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 = c4)}, `' { < s1, s0 > |(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 = c4)})
  cnveqi(c0, { < s1, s0 > |(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 = c4)})
  eqtri(c0, { < s1, s0 > |(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 = c4)}, (s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c4))
  df-mpt(s1, s0, c1, c4)
  cnvopab(s1, s0, (s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 = c4))
  df-mpt(s0, s1, c2, c3)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm f1opw(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  dff1o3(c0, c1, c2)
  funimaex(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0))
  vex(hs0)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

}

blocks.name: elovmpt3imp
blocks.content: If the value of a function which is the result of an operation defined by the maps-to notation is not empty, the operands must be sets. Remark: a function which is the result of an operation can be regared as operation with 3 operands - therefore the abbreviation "mpt3" is used in the label. (Contributed by AV, 16-May-2019.)

thm elovmpt3imp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {

  pm2.61i(wi(wne(cfv(co(c1, c2, c3), c4), emptycls), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))

  3syl(wn(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))), wi(wne(cfv(co(c1, c2, c3), c4), emptycls), wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c3, universe))), wceq(co(c1, c2, c3), emptycls), wceq(cfv(co(c1, c2, c3), c4), emptycls))
  mpt2ndm0(s0, s1, c1, universe, c3, universe, c2, cmpt(s2, c5, c6))
  syl6eq(cfv(co(c1, c2, c3), c4), emptycls, cfv(emptycls, c4), wceq(co(c1, c2, c3), emptycls))
